burst.msg_body: Sequential write of length 16 has been inferred
Could not widen since type float size is greater than or equal to the max_widen_bitwidth threshold of 0

Multiple burst writes of length 16 and bit width 32 in loop 'VITIS_LOOP_54_3'() has been inferred on bundle 'gmem'. These burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation, based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
